name: RPG PET
description:
What do you get when you mash Tamagochi and RPG together?

RPG PET

Name it, level it up, feed it, explore, complete quests, buy stuff and grow it to be stronger.

This is a prototype in which you are mostly relaxing and watching your pet in the background while you're doing other stuff.

I have more stuff behind the scenes but I want some feedback on what to improve before I go any further into development.

Thanks for playing and share with someone you think will enjoy this type of game :)
